title: My car's window has stopped working in the middle of a week-long rainstorm.
body:
.... by that i mean its stuck open, and i'm so busy with school that i cant get it fixed. So Every Morning i'm forced to trudge my miserable self into a car filled and inch deep with water and drive to school torrented by a furious rainstorm.   By now my car smells like a wet dogs steaming ass

And the seat is saturated... my bottocks bears the brunt of this merciless assult. Cold water greets my bootie and by the time i finish this horrific drive my pants are 1lb heavier in water weight.  No one understands my suffering, Is this what its like to be female in America?
